Class CompetitorDAO

java.lang.Object
main.CompetitorDAO
public class CompetitorDAO extends Object
Provides database operations for Competitor objects. Allows adding competitors, retrieving competitor IDs, and adding quiz scores for a specific level.

  • Method Details

    • addCompetitor

      public static void addCompetitor(int userID, String firstName, String lastName, String country)
      Adds a new competitor to the database.
      Parameters:
      userID - the ID of the user
      firstName - the competitor's first name
      lastName - the competitor's last name
      country - the competitor's country

    • getCompetitorID

      public static int getCompetitorID(int userID)
      Retrieves the competitor ID associated with a given user ID.
      Parameters:
      userID - the ID of the user
      Returns:
      the competitor ID, or -1 if not found

    • addQuizScore

      public static boolean addQuizScore(int competitorID, String level, int score)
      Adds a quiz score for the given competitor and level. If a row for the level exists, the score fills the first empty slot (score1â€“score5). Otherwise, a new row is inserted with the score in score1.
      Parameters:
      competitorID - the competitor's ID
      level - the competition level (e.g., Beginner, Intermediate, Advanced)
      score - the score to add
      Returns:
      true if the score was successfully added, false otherwise
